alert.note: Alert for Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 20 at 5:39AM MST until February 21 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches, with 3 to 5 inches along South Pass. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Wind River Mountains East and Wind River Mountains West. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 11 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 35 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West
